cast.name: 罗纳尔多·巴尔德斯 Ronaldo Valdez
玛德琳·尼古拉斯 Madeleine Nicolas
Desiree Del Valle Desiree Del Valle
克里斯托弗·德莱昂 Christopher De Leon

writer.name: Jose Javier Reyes Jose Javier Reyes

director.name: Jose Javier Reyes Jose Javier Reyes

introduction: The most awaited movie of the two most gorgeous faces in Philippine Cinema, Aga Muhlach and Anne Curtis is set to be the biggest date movie and most “kilig” romantic flick of the year.Written and directed by Jose Javier Reyes, the movie is about two people who avoid commitment.Aga plays Ben Caballero, 30, a lawyer turned environmentalist while Anne is a rich, marketing executive named Mitch Valmonte, who doesn’t believe in commitments.The two meet in the breathtaking Boracay.While exploring the crystal clear waters of Bora, Anne gets bitten by a sea urchin.Aga comes to the rescue and the two get attracted to each other in an instant.What happens in Bora should stay in Bora, so they say.But when love gets in the way, anything can happen.Ben and Mitch had a chance meeting while in Manila and soon find themselves falling in love with each other.Because of their age gap and the fact that both are “commitment-phobic”, rules are laid on the tables and adjustment is just endless.For a time, age doesn’t seem to matter but how much Mitch is really willing to sacrifice when it comes to choosing between her father and the man she loves?
